name: ShellStrike
description: Modular C2 framework with DNS, HTTPS, and SMB channels for red team operations. Includes beacon generation, task queuing, and encrypted comms.

name: ReconPilot
description: LLM-powered reconnaissance automation tool that chains OSINT sources, enriches targets, and generates actionable reports.

name: EDR-Evade
description: Toolkit for testing EDR bypass techniques including unhooking, direct syscalls, and AMSI patching in controlled lab environments.

name: PhishForge
description: Automated phishing infrastructure deployer. Spins up GoPhish, configures SMTP, provisions SSL certs, and manages campaign tracking.

name: VulnPipeline
description: CI/CD security scanner that integrates Semgrep, Nuclei, and Trivy into GitHub Actions with Slack/Jira alerting.

name: TokenHunter
description: Credential and secret scanner for cloud environments. Searches S3, Azure Blob, and GCS for exposed API keys, tokens, and PII.

name: MSBuild-Loader
description: Defense evasion research tool demonstrating MSBuild inline task abuse for payload execution and living-off-the-land techniques.

name: GPT-Recon
description: ChatGPT-powered subdomain enumeration and vulnerability correlation engine. Maps attack surface and prioritizes findings.

name: InfraBot
description: Terraform + Ansible automation for spinning up disposable red team infrastructure across AWS, Azure, and DigitalOcean.

name: DNSTunnel
description: Proof-of-concept DNS tunneling implant for data exfiltration research. Supports TXT, CNAME, and AAAA record encoding.

name: PurpleOps
description: MITRE ATT&CK-aligned purple team exercise framework. Auto-generates detection rules from simulated attack telemetry.

name: WebReaper
description: Fast, multi-threaded web application vulnerability scanner with smart crawling, form fuzzing, and custom payload support.

name: AI-Vuln-Triage
description: Machine learning model for automated vulnerability severity scoring. Trained on NVD data with contextual asset enrichment.

name: CloudEnum
description: Multi-cloud enumeration tool for discovering misconfigured storage buckets, open databases, and exposed services.

name: LogForwarder
description: Lightweight log aggregation agent that ships Windows Event Logs and Sysmon data to ELK/Splunk with minimal footprint.

name: CertPhisher
description: Certificate transparency monitor that alerts on lookalike domain registrations targeting specified brands and keywords.

name: LLM-Pentest-Agent
description: Autonomous penetration testing agent powered by LLMs. Chains tools like Nmap, ffuf, and sqlmap based on contextual reasoning.

name: PrivEscCheck
description: Windows and Linux privilege escalation enumeration script with automated exploit suggestion and MITRE technique mapping.
